segments.advisor_message: So, uh, let’s talk about your objectives for today. I, um, really want to make sure I understand, right? What are the specific goals you're hoping to, you know, achieve during this session?
segments.client_message: Well, I kind of want to focus on, you know, saving for my kids' college. And, um, I'd also like to explore some investment options for, like, retirement, I guess.

segments.advisor_message: I understand, that makes a lot of sense. Saving for college is, um, really important. Right? And, you know, looking into retirement is equally crucial. I’m just, um, trying to get a clear picture of all the things you’re looking at.
segments.client_message: Yeah, exactly! And I also, um, wanna make sure I’m not missing any, uh, opportunities, you know? Like, any tax breaks or whatever that could help with my savings plan.
